skills.name: Fleeting Fragrance
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Argenti's ATK to a single target enemy.

skills.name: Justice, Hereby Blooms
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Argenti's ATK to all enemies.

skills.name: For In This Garden, Supreme Beauty Bestows
skills.desc: Consumes <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> Energy and deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Argenti's ATK to all enemies.

skills.name: Sublime Object
skills.desc: For every enemy hit when Argenti uses his Basic Attack, Skill, or Ultimate, regenerates Argenti's Energy by <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak>, and grants him a stack of Apotheosis, increasing his CRIT Rate by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak></color>. This effect can stack up to <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> time(s).

skills.name: Manifesto of Purest Virtue
skills.desc: After using the Technique, enemies in a set area are inflicted with Daze for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> second(s). Dazed enemies will not actively attack the team.\nWhen attacking a Dazed enemy to enter combat, deals Physical DMG to all enemies equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Argenti's ATK and regenerates his Energy by <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak>.

skills.name: Merit Bestowed in "My" Garden
skills.desc: Consumes <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> Energy and deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Argenti's ATK to all enemies. And further deals DMG for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> extra time(s), with each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color> of Argenti's ATK to a random enemy.

eidolons.name: A Lacuna in Kingdom of Aesthetics
eidolons.desc: Each stack of Apotheosis additionally increases CRIT DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Agate's Humility
eidolons.desc: If the number of enemies on the field equals to <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> or more when the Ultimate is used, ATK increases by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

eidolons.name: Thorny Road's Glory
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Trumpet's Dedication
eidolons.desc: At the start of battle, gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> stack(s) of Apotheosis and increases the maximum stack limit of the Talent's effect by <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Snow, From Somewhere in Cosmos
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: "Your" Resplendence
eidolons.desc: When using Ultimate, ignores <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of enemy targets' DEF.

skillTree.name: Piety
skillTree.desc: At the start of a turn, immediately gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> stack(s) of Apotheosis.

skillTree.name: Generosity
skillTree.desc: When enemy targets enter battle, immediately regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy for self.

skillTree.name: Courage
skillTree.desc: Deals <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> more DMG to enemies whose HP percentage is <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> or less.
